name: SAK Architect
tag_list: architecture, interiors, interior-design, expo, exhibition, design, consultancy, architect
overview:
SAK Architects is an Architecture, Interiors & Exhibition design consultancy firm led by Shoaib A. Khan.

SAK’s design philosophy is motivated by a desire to create sensitive and stimulating environments, which achieve unique and innovative solutions for its clients.

The collective experience of the core team covers a diverse range of project types including architecture and interior designing of residences, retail outlets, shopping malls, bank branches, offices, institutional buildings and exhibition stands.

With an in-house facilities of Quantity Surveying, Bill Verification, Structural Engineering and a team of Graphic Designers, SAK can produce state-of-the-art imagery to present design ideas before the actual construction.

Independent firms for Electrical and Mechanical/Air-conditioning are also associated with the office for the design and technical support.
